synopsis.text: With Earth under siege by the resource-depleted Garadain Empire, a rogue alien scientist named Zeku Alba rallies a team of psychically gifted teenagers to fend off the extraterrestrial threat. Among these extraordinary youths is Isamu, a powerful orphan driven by the loss of his family during the initial invasion. Harnessing their mental energies, Isamu and his allies construct colossal suits of armor, with Isamu piloting the formidable Govarian. As they traverse the cosmos and engage in fierce battles, the team must overcome personal conflicts and unite to safeguard their home planet from the relentless Garadain onslaught.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
